definition: to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
to devote oneself to spiritual development (esp. Buddhism or Daoism)/to devote oneself to perfecting one's art or craft
